Translations.Text: appudu vari mundu varu cestu undina duskaryalu, pratyaksamavutayi. Mariyu varu denini gurinci parihasamadutu unnaro, ade varini kram'mukuntundi
mariyu varito ila anabadutundi: "I roju memu mim'malni maraci potamu, e vidhanganaite miru mi samavesapu i dinanni maracipoyaro! Mariyu mi nivasam narakagniye mariyu miku sahayapadevaru evvaru undaru

Idi endukante, vastavaniki miru allah sucanalanu (ayat lanu) parihasanga tisukunnaru. Mariyu ihaloka jivitam mim'malni mosapuccindi. Kavuna i roju varini dani (narakam) nundi bayatiki tiyadam jaragadu. Mariyu variki tama tappulanu sarididdukune avakasamu dorakadu
ika sarvastotralaku ar'hudu allah matrame! Ayane akasalaku prabhuvu mariyu bhumiki prabhuvu; ayane sarvalokalaku kuda prabhuvu
akasalalo mariyu bhumilo ghanata (mahaniyata) ayanake cendutundi. Mariyu ayane sarvasaktimantudu, maha vivekavantudu
i grantham (khur'an) avatarana sarvasaktimantudu, maha vivekavantudaina allah taraphu nundi jarigindi

memu akasalanu, bhumini mariyu vati madhya unna samastanni, satyanto oka nirnita kalam koraku matrame srstincamu. Mariyu satyanni tiraskarincina varu tamaku ceyabadina heccarika nundi vimukhulavu tunnaru

varito ila anu: "Allah nu vadali miru prarthistunna vatini gurinci alocincara? Ayite naku cupandi. Varu bhumilo emi srstincaro? Leda, variki akasalalo edaina bhagamunda? Miru satyavantule ayite, diniki (i khur'an ku) mundu vaccina edaina granthanni leda edaina migili unna jnananni tecci cupandi

mariyu allah nu vadali punarut'thana dinam varaku tama prarthanalanu vini samadhana mivvalenatuvanti varini prarthince vari kante, ekkuva margabhrastulevaru? Mariyu varu (tamanu prarthince) vari prarthanalanu erugakunda unnaru
